name: Garbage Truck Simulator (itch)
description:
Game for Ludum Dare #40

Description
  • GarbageTruck “Simulator”
  • Collect Garbage from dumpster and Deliver to Deposit Zone for Points
  • More Bags delivered simultaniusly give more points
  • MORE BAGS YOU COLLECT, WORSE THE VISION ARE!
  • Deliver gives time
Controls:
  • Throttle: W
  • Brake/Reverse: S
  • Turn: A-D
  • Pick Dumpster : Space
Tools:
  • Unity 2017
  • Visual Studio
  • Blender 2.7
  • Audacity
